name: AcrossWorld Education
description: AcrossWorld Education (AcrossWorld), and its business process improvement offering, provides a complete service set based on content and tool enabled technology platform services to academic institutions, foundations and governments, to improve the quality of education and collaborative knowledge management.  Through its proven consulting methodology, open source software applications, and incorporation of social networking tools, AcrossWorld enables the new knowledge economy by connecting educators, providing enhanced discovery and search, and allowing for enhancement of course content. Web 2.0 technologies and true service oriented architecture empower a global user community to create an innovative approach to traditional education programs and new opportunities in knowledge management.
